# angle

**Instance Property**

The angle, in radians, of the tiled pattern.

## Declaration

```swift
var angle: Float { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **center**: The x and y position to use as the center of the effect.
- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
- **width**: The width of a tile.
